entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You have disabled the droid factory
entries.journal_entry_description: In order to disable the droid factory you need to locate and activate the override control at the bottom of the factory.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: You need to locate the control override terminal in the bottom of the droid factory.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: You have activated the override terminal, return to Lieutenant Varias.
entries.task02_comm_message_text: IG88: It would seem that you were responsible for shutting down the factory. I had plans for that installation, plan which I will now have to alter. I will find a way to repay you. I have a feeling I will see you again at some point in the future.
